title.justification: This is the primary title as provided in the start of the paper.

extractions.description: This paper identifies governance functions that international institutions could perform to ensure advanced AI systems benefit humanity. It proposes four institutional models: a Commission on Frontier AI, an Advanced AI Governance Organization, a Frontier AI Collaborative, and an AI Safety Project, discussing their utility and viability.

type.justification: The paper primarily discusses concepts, models, and governance frameworks regarding international institutions for AI without conducting empirical experiments or studies.
type.quote: This paper identifies a set of governance functions that could be performed at an international level...

name.justification: The paper is focused on governance functions and institutional models specific to AI, particularly advanced AI systems.
name.quote: This paper identifies a set of governance functions that could be performed at an international level to address these challenges, ranging from supporting access to frontier AI systems to setting international safety standards.

name.justification: The paper discusses AI policy issues, such as regulatory efforts, international standards, and compliance monitoring.
name.quote: ...could help internationalize and align efforts to address global risks from advanced AI systems by setting governance norms and standards, and assisting in their implementation.

name.justification: The paper explores the establishment of an AI Safety Project focused on technical mitigations of AI risks.
name.quote: ...an AI Safety Project that brings together leading researchers and engineers to further AI safety research.
